p.s: File_Fortune provides an interface for reading from and writing to fortune files.
p.d:
File_Fortune provides a PHP interface to reading fortune files. With it, you may retrieve a single fortune, a random fortune, or all fortunes in the file.
Additionally, it offers the ability to access fortune files as if they were a native array, including updating and deleting items. All write operations will produce a binary header file to allow compatability with the fortune and fortune-mod programs (as well as other fortune interfaces).
